articles.content: Over two dozen cases of the rare blood disorder thrombocytopenia have been reported in people who have received COVID vaccines in the U.S. However, a link between COVID vaccines and the disease that … [+3128 chars]

articles.author: Deborah Takahara
articles.title: Aurora US Postal Service carrier robbed, truck stolen - FOX 31 Denver
articles.description: Aurora police are searching for two men who robbed a mail carrier and stole a U.S. Postal Service delivery truck.
articles.content: AURORA, Colo. (KDVR) Aurora police are searching for two men who robbed a mail carrier and stole a U.S. Postal Service delivery truck. The incident happened near East Kentucky Avenue and East Ohio Ci… [+1579 chars]
